statements: SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM risk_assessment_transactions WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount, customer_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM risk_assessment_transactions WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM risk_assessment_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM risk_assessment_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM risk_assessment_transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date FROM risk_assessment_transactions WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT customer_id, date, amount, risk_level FROM risk_assessment_transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, risk_score, risk_recommendation FROM risk_assessment_results WHERE risk_score >= 0.5;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_transactions WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT transaction_id, date, amount FROM risk_assessment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, risk_level, customer_id FROM risk_assessment_transactions WHERE customer_id = 123 OR risk_level = 'Medium';

SELECT r.transaction_id, r.risk_score, r.risk_recommendation, t.date FROM risk_assessment_results r JOIN risk_assessment_transactions t ON r.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE r.risk_score > 0.7 ORDER BY t.date;

SELECT t.date, t.amount, r.risk_recommendation FROM risk_assessment_transactions t JOIN risk_assessment_results r ON t.transaction_id = r.transaction_id WHERE r.risk_recommendation = 'Decline' ORDER BY t.date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_level = 'high'
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, risk_score FROM transactions WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_level = 'High' AND assessment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM transactions INNER JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customers.address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM risk_assessment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_transactions WHERE risk_score > 50;
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customer_data WHERE LENGTH(customer_name) > 10;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM risk_assessment_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING MAX(transaction_amount) > 1000;
SELECT t.*, c.customer_name FROM transaction_history t JOIN customer_data c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT r.*, c.customer_name FROM risk_scores r LEFT JOIN customer_data c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE r.risk_score >= 7 ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_id = 3;
SELECT assessment_id, risk_score, assessment_date FROM risk_assessments WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT assessment_id, transaction_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessments WHERE risk_score >= 70 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_name IN ('Fraud', 'Compliance') ORDER BY factor_name ASC;
SELECT assessment_id, overall_score, recommendation FROM risk_scores WHERE overall_score < 0.5 ORDER BY assessment_id ASC;
